message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  This is a good starting point, but we can negotiate.
I'll give you the majority, but I think I deserve more than 10%
Okay, I understand you want more.  I'll take 75% and you can have 25%. This is a reasonable compromise, but I'm not willing to go lower than that.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think 25% is too low. Let's meet in the middle at 50%
I'm willing to go down a little further, but I think we can still agree on a fair split.  Let's settle on 60/40.  If we keep going, the money will be worth less for both of us.
I'm not willing to go up to 60%, but I'll meet you at 55% to show good faith. Let's end this negotiation and finalize the split
